page.title: 15THE SWAN AT BUCKLOW HILL
page.content: THIS TRADITIONAL, OAK BEAMED COACHING INN HAS TAKEN ADVANTAGE OF AN IDEAL POSITION TO EXPAND TO A 74 BEDROOM RESIDENTIAL AND CONFERENCE CENTRE. IT IS 1 MILE FROM THE M6 2 MILES FROM THE M56 AND 7 MILES FROM MANCHESTER AIRPORT.{THE SWAN }OFFERS A{PACKAGE {DEAL FOR AIR TRAVELLERS}OF OVERNIGHT STOP, BREAKFAST AND TRANSPORT TO AND FROM THE AIRPORT WHIULE THEIR CAR IS GARAGED AT THE INN. {BANQUETING FACILITIES} FOR 60 AND MEETING ROOMS FOR VARIOUS NUMBERS FROM 10 TO 40 CAN BE ADAPTED FOR MANY PURPOSES. A STONE MILE POST SET INTO THE WALL MAY DATE BACK TO ROMAN TIMES AS THIS WAS WATLING STREET.HALF A MILE AWAY IS CAMP GREEN AND CICELY MILL, THE REMAINS OF A CORN MILL OF MEDIEVAL ORIGIN.
